alert.note: Alert for Rush; Shelby (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:57PM EDT until July 02 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHERN SHELBY AND SOUTHWESTERN RUSH COUNTIES... At 457 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shelbyville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Shelbyville, St. Paul and Waldron around 505 PM EDT. Moscow around 510 PM EDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 near mile marker 82. Interstate 74 between mile markers 111 and 123. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
